title: Lemon Butter Orzo with Parsley
directions: In a large saucepan over high heat, bring water to a boil. Add orzo. Cover and reduce heat to medium. Cook until pasta is tender, 10-12 minutes.

Drain orzo and return to pan. Stir in butter, lemon zest and juice, parsley, paprika, salt and pepperÂ until well blended. Spoon into a large serving dish and sprinkle with grated Parmesan. Serve warm.
ingredients: Kosher salt and coarse black pepper, to taste
